original_text: Who can open the doors of his face? his teeth are terrible round about.
korean_text: 누가 그것의 턱을 벌릴 수 있겠느냐 그의 둥근 이틀은 심히 두렵구나

sentences.original_text: Who can open the doors of his face?
sentences.korean_translation: 누가 그의 얼굴 문들을 열 수 있는가?

sentences.original_text: his teeth are terrible round about
